amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert an exception for any rule, consent decree, or settlement agreement that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation and whose benefits exceeds its costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-388 to insert an exception for any rule, consent decree, or settlement agreement that the Director of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job creation and whose benefits exceeds its costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 242 (Roll no. 7).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 242 (Roll no. 7).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
